title: [CRASH] Keep reconnecting to game after Champ selection

embed.description: Google Drive is a free way to keep your files backed up and easy to reach from any phone, tablet, or computer. Start with 15GB of Google storage - free.

replies.body:
yea, it's the new "anti-cheat" function they incorporated.. 
lots of us have had this issue, and Riot still hasn't given us a fix for it.. check the main post riot pinned.. 
if this isn't fixed i won't be able to play at all...

You know, what made me upset is this problem occurred in PBE months earlier and many people reported this problem. But NO ONE BUG CHECKER CARES. And then they insist to push this troublesome patch to NA. I can't understand.{{sticker:sg-soraka}}

Hey CEMAzxw, 

Can you please give me access to the file? Thank you!

Hi,

I've updated the link, you could access with this link: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/12plu52p8iqMl5-THEGEIBvk18DzSn2XW?usp=sharing
Thank you for your reply, looking forward to hearing from you.

Best.

Hey,

You have the same problem as these folks here: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/REWPebmZ-cannot-load-and-connect-into-the-game

You need to remove "xunyount.dll" and follow these [instructions](https://iihelp.iinet.net.au/Resetting_Network_Adapter_%28Winsock_Reset%29).

Hi,

I am suffering the same issue.  Can you please check it out? Thank you!

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1GrL3elwK2sm4ZK61SeTRIonkDf_hfP81/view?usp=sharing

Thank you very much for getting me back to rift! I love you so much.♥

Have a nice day!

And sorry for saying 'no bug checker cares.'. Bug checkers in NA are so nice and responsible.♥
